casebody.data:
LORAIN CTY. BAR ASSN.
v.
WEIR 2018-1447 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 8, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENT

DISCIPLINARY CASE

Sua sponte, Jeffrey Hile Weir II, Attorney Registration No. 0067470, last known business address in Lorain, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to file an affidavit of compliance on or before July 5, 2019.
